name: Kenny Davis - Murder or Suicide, It's Up to You
name_original: Kenny Davis - Murder or Suicide, It's Up to You
description:
Kenny Davis is dead and you have 9 suspects, a crime scene and a few items. Connect the clues and attach them to suspects to find out who really did it. 

The game has 9 suspects but 10 endings. Try to get all of them ;)

Credits:

  • Michael Giraldo : programmer, 3D artist, Voice Actor, Story Writer
  • Mariano Contreras : 2D artist, Voice Actor, Story Writer
  • Logan Spencer :  Voice Actor, Story Writer

Special Thanks To:

  • Ana : Voice Actor
  • Tori : Voice Actor
